item.text: Then Jesus told them a parable to show them they should always pray and not lose heart.

He <st data-num="3004">said</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> a <st data-num="5100" class="">certain</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st><n id="2" /> there <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="2923" class="">judge</st><n id="3" /> who <st data-num="3361" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="5399" class="">feared</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">nor</st> <st data-num="1788" class="">respected</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>.<n id="4" />

There <st data-num="1510">was</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">also</st> a <st data-num="5503" class="">widow</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st><n id="2" /> who kept <st data-num="2064" class="">coming</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, ‘<st data-num="1556" class="">Give</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1556" class="">justice</st> <st data-num="575" class="">against</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="476" class="">adversary.’</st>

<st data-num="1909" class="">For</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="5550" class="">while</st> he <st data-num="3756 2309" class="">refused</st>, <st data-num="1161">but</st> <st data-num="3326">later</st> <st data-num="3778">on</st><n id="2" /> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>, ‘<st data-num="1499">Though</st> I <st data-num="3756" class="">neither</st> <st data-num="5399" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">nor</st> have <st data-num="1788" class="">regard</st> for <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1065" class="">yet</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5503" class="">widow</st> <st data-num="3930">keeps on</st> <st data-num="2873" class="">bothering</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, I will <st data-num="1556" class="">give</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="1556" class="">justice</st>, or <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5056" class="">end</st> she will <st data-num="5299" class="">wear</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="5299" class="">out</st><n id="1" /> by <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="5056">unending</st> <st data-num="2064">pleas</st>.’”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="191">Listen</st> to <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> the <st data-num="93" class="">unrighteous</st> <st data-num="2923" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">says</st>!<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3756">Won’t</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">give</st> <st data-num="1557" class="">justice</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1588">chosen ones</st>, who <st data-num="994">cry out</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st>?<n id="3" /> Will he <st data-num="3114">delay<n id="4" /> long to help</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>?
I tell you, he will give them justice speedily. Nevertheless, when the Son of Man comes, will he find faith on earth?”
Jesus also told this parable to some who were confident that they were righteous and looked down on everyone else.

“<st data-num="1417">Two</st> <st data-num="444" class="">men</st> <st data-num="305">went up</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2413">temple</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st>, <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> a <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisee</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2087" class="">other</st> a <st data-num="5057">tax collector</st>.<n id="3" />

The <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisee</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st> and <st data-num="4336" class="">prayed</st> <st data-num="4314">about</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> like <st data-num="3778" class="">this:</st><n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="2316">God</st>, I <st data-num="2168" class="">thank</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5618">like</st> <st data-num="3062" class="">other</st> <st data-num="444">people</st>:<n id="3" /> <st data-num="727" class="">extortionists</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="94">unrighteous people</st>,<n id="5" /> <st data-num="3432" class="">adulterers</st>—<st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5057">tax collector</st>.<n id="6" />

I <st data-num="3522" class="">fast</st> <st data-num="1364" class="">twice</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="4521" class="">week;</st> I <st data-num="586">give a tenth</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> I <st data-num="2932" class="">get.’</st>

The <st data-num="5057">tax collector</st>, <st data-num="1161">however</st>, <st data-num="2476" class="">stood</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3113">far off</st> and <st data-num="2309" class="">would</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">not even</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">look</st> <st data-num="3788" class="">up</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5180" class="">beat</st> <st data-num="846">his</st> <st data-num="4738" class="">breast</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, ‘<st data-num="2316">God</st>, <st data-num="2433">be merciful</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="268" class="">sinner</st> that I am!’<n id="4" />
I tell you that this man went down to his home justified rather than the Pharisee. For everyone who exalts himself will be humbled, but he who humbles himself will be exalted.”
Now people were even bringing their babies to him for him to touch. But when the disciples saw it, they began to scold those who brought them.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4341" class="">called</st> for the <st data-num="846" class="">children</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="863">Let</st> the <st data-num="3813">little children</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> try to <st data-num="2967" class="">stop</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">belongs</st> to <st data-num="5108">such as these</st>.<n id="3" />
I tell you the truth, whoever does not receive the kingdom of God like a child will never enter it.”
Now a certain leader asked him, “Good teacher, what must I do to inherit eternal life?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> do you <st data-num="3004" class="">call</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="18" class="">good</st>?<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3762">No one</st> is <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">alone</st>.
You know the commandments: ‘Do not commit adultery, do not murder, do not steal, do not give false testimony, honor your father and mother.’”

The man<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">replied</st>, “I have wholeheartedly <st data-num="5442" class="">obeyed</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> laws<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">since</st> my <st data-num="3503" class="">youth</st>.”<n id="4" />

When <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this, he <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1520">One thing</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> <st data-num="3007" class="">lack</st>. <st data-num="4453" class="">Sell</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> that you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1239" class="">give</st> the money<n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="4434" class="">poor</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="2344" class="">treasure</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="1204" class="">come</st>, <st data-num="190" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when the man<n id="1" /> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, he <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> <st data-num="4036">very sad</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4970" class="">extremely</st> <st data-num="4145" class="">wealthy</st>.

When <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">noticed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">this</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="4459">How</st> <st data-num="1423" class="">hard</st><n id="2" /> it is for the <st data-num="5536 2192">rich</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1531" class="">enter</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>!<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">In fact</st>, it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2123" class="">easier</st> for a <st data-num="2574" class="">camel</st> to <st data-num="1525" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="5168">eye of a needle</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> for a <st data-num="4145">rich person</st> to <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.”

Those who <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2532">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>?”<n id="2" />

He <st data-num="3004">replied</st>, “What is <st data-num="102" class="">impossible</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3844" class="">for</st> mere <st data-num="444" class="">humans</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1415" class="">possible</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “<st data-num="2400">Look</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> have <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> everything <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="2398" class="">own</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="190" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>!

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> Jesus<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281" class="">truth</st>,<n id="3" /> there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> has <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">home</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1118" class="">parents</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> <st data-num="1752">for the sake of</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st>
who will not receive many times more in this age—and in the age to come, eternal life.”
Then Jesus took the twelve aside and said to them, “Look, we are going up to Jerusalem, and everything that is written about the Son of Man by the prophets will be accomplished.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> he will be <st data-num="3860">handed over</st><n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="1484" class="">Gentiles;</st> he will be <st data-num="1702" class="">mocked</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5195" class="">mistreated</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1716">spat on</st>.<n id="4" />

They will <st data-num="3146" class="">flog</st> him <st data-num="3146" class="">severely</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Yet</st><n id="2" /> on the <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> he will <st data-num="450">rise</st> again.”
But the twelve understood none of these things. This saying was hidden from them, and they did not grasp what Jesus meant.
As Jesus approached Jericho, a blind man was sitting by the road begging.

When he <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> a <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="1279">going by</st>, he <st data-num="4441" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1510">was</st> <st data-num="3778">going on</st>.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="518" class="">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="2424">Jesus</st> the <st data-num="3480" class="">Nazarene</st> is <st data-num="3928">passing by</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="994">called out</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="2424">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1653">have mercy</st><n id="4" /> on <st data-num="1473">me</st>!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> those who <st data-num="4254">were in front</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2008" class="">scolded</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> get <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to be <st data-num="4601" class="">quiet</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> he <st data-num="2896" class="">shouted</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4183">even</st> <st data-num="3123">more</st>, “<st data-num="5207">Son</st> of <st data-num="1138" class="">David</st>, <st data-num="1653">have mercy</st> on <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2424">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stopped</st> and <st data-num="2753" class="">ordered</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">beggar</st><n id="2" /> to be <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. When the <st data-num="846">man</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1448">came near</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,

“<st data-num="5101">What</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> me to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?” He <st data-num="3004">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2962">Lord</st>, let me <st data-num="308">see again</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="308" class="">Receive</st><n id="2" /> your <st data-num="308" class="">sight;</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> has <st data-num="4982" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.”<n id="3" />
And immediately he regained his sight and followed Jesus, praising God. When all the people saw it, they too gave praise to God.
